title: scripty, sort of typewriteresque ... please help ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025080939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/masthead-name_3423.jpg)

I suspect it’s an attempt to create an italic companion to a typewriter face ... monospaced ... any ideas?

 [‹ can anyone tell me this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025080939/http:/typophile.com/node/50796 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old script shampoo type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025080939/http:/typophile.com/node/50792 "Go to next forum topic")
author: calyxdesign

comments.content:
Hi Richard,

that’s [LTC Remington Typewriter Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025080939/http:/www.p22.com/Lanston/remington.html).  
F
Yes it is cute. I see that Goudy did it. The hand of a master shows itself even in this monoline, monospace—which makes it pretty weird, none the less.

How about that! I can’t say Goudy’s name is the last one I would have guessed, but I am surprised ...

Thanks for the ID, Florian.
